name: FallingFruit
description:
I've been learning Unity for like 5 days. Here is my first game. Falling Fruit is based on collecting fruit and not to touch bombs coming from sky. Game consists of 2  levels, if you play harder level you will see more bombs falling. You will be controlling Chef Arthur and I would say that be careful because he would be very angry if he hits the bombs. I've a budget pc and I just wanted to earn some money to upgrade it a bit with this small project. It gets freezes for seconds and it makes me angry while using Unity. If you want to support me please donate. Take care...

(I recommend 1024*768 resolution)
